title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, Ross Tucker fills in for DP. He and the guys recap a fun weekend in College Football, MLB Playoffs, and NFL. Albert Breer calls in to discuss if this season will have an affect on Tom Brady's legacy, and CBS college football analyst Rick Neuheisel shares what he thinks Alabama's road to a National Title will look like after the loss to Tennessee. Why was Ross the most nervous he's ever been to fill in for DP?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
